intro: Neophylum, commonly known as the false hellebore, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Melanthiaceae. It consists of several species that are native to temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere. The plants typically have basal leaves that are broad and lobed, with a rosette-like arrangement.
